name: FLICK FISHING
description:
An arcade sports fishing game where the player goes fishing at different locations on the map to get the best fishing experience!!!

The player has to cast the line and with a skillful combination of bait, location and technique has to hook a fish. Once the fish gets hooked to the line, just reel it in. The player has 9 types of baits to tackle with and the bigger the fish, the more strength it takes to reel it in however try not to reel in too fast to avoid snapping the line and losing the fish. There are various types of fishes to catch ranging from carp to the blue marlin. Enjoy Fishing!!!
